text: We have a client that wants to make sure dynamic pages will have as much SEO weight as regular website pages and I could not find a definitive answer to that anywhere, do they get crawled like a regular page? If not, how do search engines treat dynamic pages?

i would assume that they receive just as much weight as any other page on the site and that when a HubDB table that is used for dynamic pages is associated with the parent page, HS adds all valid parent/slug combinations to the site-map
yeah, to a crawler, they look like any other page
Thanks y'all! We'll let the client know.
